text: I decided to change up the way I do the
travel Q&A videos so instead of just
answering question after question in one
video I decided to break it up into
several then each week I'm going to
create a video like this one and you can
think of it kind of like the contents
that you find at the beginning of any
book which gives you the breakdown of
each chapter and you can flip through
the book to that specific chapter so
instead of watching one long video I've
broken up the questions into separate
videos but you'll see questions that i
will be answering this week on the side
here and you can click on any of those
and it will take you to that specific
video where i answer that question of
course you can watch one or you can
watch them all whatever you're
interested in now is it to you pick one
anyone and while you decide I will do a
little dance to distract you which is
probably not the best idea because then
you won't pick a video to watch
